name: InTouchLinkVoiceAccess
0:
”Alexa open my residence”
”Alexa ask my residence what's for breakfast”
”Alexa ask my residence what's happening today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my residence
Developer Terms of Use
des:
InTouchLink Voice Access allows community residents within senior residence homes to access information such as breakfast, lunch or dinner. This app can be used on private Alexa devices within member rooms. For usage in public spaces, please contact InTouchLink at 1-877-784-6868 or
info@intouchlink.net for our enterprise / corporate solutions.
